name: Huldra
description:
Huldra is a narrative TTRPG for 3-5 people, the game is played with this rulebook, a single suit from a deck of cards and some pencil and paper to note own how many memories your characters are carrying. The game is about overcoming emotional pain, and feeling like you are part of a community, the humans have traumas that shape them and the Huldra wants to be one of them but is afraid of revealing themself. You play these people and their interactions with each other and the world.

Everything in this booklet is written by me, based on Avery Alder's Dream Askew.
